front.title: IKEv2 based flow control extension of PMIPv6

abstract.t: PMIPv6 is designed to provide network based mobility, it requries no changes to the UE. There are proposals to extend PMIPv6 to support flow mobility. Flow mobility requries the UE and the network have communication protocol to carry the flow control information. This document proposes to use the IKEv2 protocol to carry the flow control information between the UE and network.
